markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rat Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=1308) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can transform into an innocuous-looking rat to scout an area or slip through tight spaces. You gain the effects of a 1st-level [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=217) spell, except that you must assume the battle form of a Tiny rat.
name: Rat Form
